readable.title: 3378553508_e37e281d25
readable.content: Behind a " 3rd St " sign and traffic light , building construction continues . On a multi-story construction site a number of workers in red shirts lean on temporary railings and rest . People are standing in a building that 's under construction near 3rd St . Several people are looking out from a building that is under construction . several workers standing in a partially constructed building behind street sign
